

192.168.24.36/27


               192.168.24.36 = 11000000.10101000.00011000.00100100
        /27= 255.255.255.224 = 11111111.11111111.11111111.11100000


11000000.10101000.00011000.001 00100
11111111.11111111.11111111.111 00000



Network Address:
11000000.10101000.00011000.001 00000=192.168.24.32




27 - 24(Class c) => 3 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^3 => 8

Number of host bits remaining available => 8(default) - 3(subnetbits) => 5 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^5)-2 => 32-2=> 30

Firt Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011000.001 00001=>192.168.24.33

Last Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011000.001 11110 =>192.168.24.62

Previous Subnet Address:
11000000.10101000.00011000.000 00000 => 192.168.24.0

Next Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00011000.010 00000=> 192.168.24.64


Broadcast Address:

11000000.10101000.00011000.001 11111=> 192.168.24.63

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP)address:
11000000.10101000.00011000.00100011=> 192.168.24.35


Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address:
11000000.10101000.00011000.00100101=> 192.168.24.37
